game.name: Sara’s Pineapple Cake
game.description:
Pineapple cake is always good to eat, but not everyone knows how to prepare it. In this free online game ? Sara Pineapple Cake ? you will get a chance to learn how to make this delicious recipe by just following a few simple instructions provided by Sara. One of the best games to play for girls,  Sara Pineapple Cake gives you a wonderful opportunity to help a beautiful girl, ?Sara? cook the highly scrumptious pineapple cake and become an expert for the same. 

You can also use the toppings like pineapple rings, Maraschino and some brown sugar to decorate your sweet dish. Use the pan and bake your pineapple cake recipe at the bottom of it allowing the topping to be caramelized properly. Do not forget to flip it timely when serving to your loved ones. Very yummy! This extremely delicious cake is sure to turn your small event into a big one. In this cooking game for girls, you would surely get a chance to learn scrumptious pineapple cake recipe. 

Help beautiful girl Sara to make the most delicious pineapple cake! All you need to do is follow her instructions properly and assist her to achieve the highest score possible. So, what are you waiting for? If you always wanted to learn how to cook pineapple cake in just a few simple steps. Join the session of Sara Cooking Class Pineapple Cake and become an expert in cooking.
